data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,463,300 people living in the county of Jabalpur.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,463,300 souls living in the county of Jabalpur with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bhoi Nauria people.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Jabalpur against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Jabalpur
location.people_groups_list: Katia, Mang Garudi, Rajput Bagri, Lodha (Hindu traditions), Naroda
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Katia (218,000), Mang Garudi (77,000), Rajput Bagri (29,000), Lodha (Hindu traditions) (6,608,000), Naroda (39,000)
